fields.name: Mountain seal control
fields.description: There is an overabundance of mountain seals and the population must be controlled.  Empty Jameson bottles are required for clubbing

fields.name: Cordova Community Cold Storage
fields.description: Providing a facility and method for sustainable salmon fishing in the Cordova region of Alaska

fields.name: ReAllocate
fields.description: Connecting knowledge with need to move the world from money to meaning

fields.name: Jameson required
fields.description: 10 Bottles of Jameson needed to be drunk and then used to club seals

fields.name: Energy Mapping
fields.description: Complete an energy audit and map usage for community cold storage

fields.name: Create Product Prototype
fields.description: Build a prototype brace to treat children with club foot

fields.name: Build an online Marketplace
fields.description: Create an online marketplace to help projects connect with skilled volunteers to do good

fields.name: Build non profit website
fields.description: Create a website for to help Todays Future Sound publish their work teaching children to DJ

fields.name: Create Product Prototype
fields.description: Build a prototype for a radiation sensing RC vehicle to help children detect radiation in Fukushima Japan

fields.text: "If you're going through hell, keep going." -Churchill
